messages.subject: Re: GROW UP!
messages.msgSnippet: ... The Cosmos loves to deposit mail like this in my mailbox JUST when ALL the other unschooling.com mail coming in has been real-and-interesting unschooling
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1477
>Date: Sat, Sep 15, 2001, 3:19 PM
>

> I have been deleting alot of mail lately, as I am in no mood to take the time
> to sign onto my computer and find people bashing people. Please take
> your cutting down of others privately and off this list.
> If I wanted to read junk, I would send my son back to PS, and attend IEP
> meetings
> daily.
>
> GROW UP!
> I use this list for information and direction, not to open a piece of mail and
> be a included on this yucky party line.


The Cosmos loves to deposit mail like this in my mailbox JUST when ALL the
other unschooling.com mail coming in has been real-and-interesting
unschooling topics and answers to same and no bickering or rudeness.

Part of being a grownup means learning that everything is not about you.
(And that if you do read instead of deleting you'll know when the discussion
has moved on, rather than suddenly leaping into a room of calm, productive
people and yelling at them).

Yours for calm productiveness,

Pam

messages.subject: GROW UP!
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Unschooling list group, I have been deleting alot of mail lately, as I am in no mood to take the time to sign onto my computer and find people bashing
messages.messageBody:
Dear Unschooling list group,

I have been deleting alot of mail lately, as I am in no mood to take the time
to sign onto my computer and find people bashing people. Please take
your cutting down of others privately and off this list.
If I wanted to read junk, I would send my son back to PS, and attend IEP
meetings
daily.

GROW UP!
I use this list for information and direction, not to open a piece of mail and
be a included on this yucky party line.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
